href.description: A link to the Web API endpoint returning the full result of the request.

limit.description: The maximum number of items in the response (as set in the query or by default).

next.description: URL to the next page of items. (null if none)

offset.description: The offset of the items returned (as set in the query or by default).

previous.description: URL to the previous page of items. (null if none)

total.description: The total number of items available to return.
